welcome_message_body: Welcome to Beaverton! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its beautiful parks, diverse dining options, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Beaverton has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Portland Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport houses the majority of the airport's amenities and services, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a satellite terminal at Portland International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights operated by Alaska Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a satellite terminal at Portland International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is a satellite terminal at Portland International Airport, primarily serving international flights operated by airlines such as Air Canada, Icelandair, and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network 'PDX Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves domestic flights within Papua New Guinea.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Troutdale Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
